titleStmt.title: A true narrative of the confession and execution of the four prisoners executed at Tyburn on Wednesday the 5th of this instant February 1684 [...] Davis, George Stokes, Mary Williamson, Alice Patteson, who was burnt at Tyburn for high treason.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Mallet, in Black-Horse-alley near Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Date of publicatiion from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
